title: AI-Generated Videos & Deepfakes (2025)
description:
# AI-Generated Videos & Deepfakes (2025)

**TIME Magazine:** Trump is **"the first world leader to fully deploy AI deepfakes as a core communications strategy."** He has shared dozens of AI-generated images and videos on Truth Social, blurring the line between satire and reality.

## "King Trump" Fighter Jet Video

- AI video showing Trump wearing a crown, piloting a fighter jet
- Depicts him **dumping excrement on protesters below**
- Posted to official Truth Social account

## Other AI Deepfakes Shared by Trump

- **Barack Obama:** Deepfake showing former president being arrested in orange jumpsuit
- **Hakeem Jeffries:** Racist AI image depicting Black House Minority Leader in fake mustache and sombrero
- **Nancy Pelosi:** AI video with falsified voice
- **Adam Schiff:** Depicted in handcuffs being arrested
- **Gavin Newsom:** Depicted being arrested
- **Russ Vought:** Depicted as grim reaper
- **Gov. Pritzker & Chris Christie:** Depicted as sumo wrestlers
- **"MedBeds" conspiracy:** Fake Fox News clip promoting imaginary healing devices that cure all diseases
summary: TIME Magazine: Trump is "the first world leader to fully deploy AI deepfakes as a core communications strategy." He has shared dozens of AI-generated images and videos on Truth Social, blurring the line between satire and reality.
